name: More Color Schemes
author: Kreatix

sections.description:
A color schemes plugin made by Kreatix. Head to your user profile and discover new color schemes for your admin environment. If you have any suggestions or bugs to report, please contact oliver@kreatix.be

Color schemes:

12 new color schemes for the admin panel.

  1. Cotton Candy
  2. Default Alternative
  3. Eggplant
  4. Kreatix
  5. Lemon
  6. Nerf
  7. Pastel
  8. Police
  9. Sea
  10. Summer
  11. Uber Dark Night
  12. Vampire

Changelog

1.0

  • Initial Release ‘More Color Schemes’

Requires at least: wordpress 3.8
Tested up to 4.7.5
License: GPLv2
License URI: http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-2.0.html
